sentences.english: It is mandatory to provide the names and email addresses of four potential reviewers (non-Board members) here !
sentences.chinese: 是“找四位非該期刊執行成員作爲審稿人”的意思嗎？

sentences.english: So make sure your manuscript looks carefully prepared; it may influence editors and referees in your favor .
sentences.chinese: 精心準備，給編輯和審稿人一個好的印象。

sentences.english: I thought the paper was excellent and it was favorably reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 這篇論文很優秀，得到了審稿人的青睞。

sentences.english: Reviewers will not "rate" your site compared to other sites.
sentences.chinese: 審稿人不會將您的網站與其他網站相“評分”。

sentences.english: The page proofs have been read and approved by the responsible reader .
sentences.chinese: 拼版樣已經審稿人審讀通過。

sentences.english: It is the key of keeping the academic level of a journal to choose the reviewers correctly.
sentences.chinese: 正確地選擇審稿人是保證期刊學術水平的關鍵。

sentences.english: He was one of the peer reviewers for the British athlete study.
sentences.chinese: 他也是那個英國研究項目學術論文的審稿人之一。

sentences.english: I have extracted these concerns from comments by the reviewers to the editor.
sentences.chinese: 審稿人都沒有提這個，是主編自己延伸的。
